params._initialOwner: Address that will own this contract

getAddresses().details: Useful for contracts that need both addresses

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMaintainerVault(address).details: Only callable by owner (ArxOS LLC initially, DAO later)

setTreasury(address).details: Only callable by owner (ArxOS LLC initially, DAO later)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getAddresses().notice: Get all system addresses in one call

maintainerVault().notice: Address of the maintainer vault (10% of all mints/payments)

treasury().notice: Address of the treasury (10% of all mints/payments)
